org.drip.analytics.curve

Class PolynomialSplineDF

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.analytics.definition.DiscountCurve
        • org.drip.analytics.curve.PolynomialSplineDF
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Curve

    public class PolynomialSplineDF
extends DiscountCurve
    This class contains the polynomial spline discount factor based discount curve holder object. It maintains term structure for the period begin rates, the calibration instruments, calibration measures, calibration quotes, and parameters.
